posts.title: Hello World
posts.excerpt: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server 12import cv2img = cv2.imread('image.jpg') More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy æµ‹è¯•æ­å»ºéœ€æ±‚ï¼šæœåŠ¡å™¨ä¸€å°åŸŸåä¸€ä¸ªç²—ä½“æ–œä½“æ··åˆç²—ä½“æ–œä½“ ListsUnorderd Item 1 Item 2 Item 2a Item 3b Ordered Item 1 Item 2 Item 3 Item 3a Item 3b Nested Lists First List item First nested list item Second neseted list item Tast Lists Finish my changes Push my commits to GitHub Open a pull requst (Optional) Open a followup issueImages<%- image_tag(/images/logo.png, width=20,heitht=20) %> Blockquotes, As Kanye West said: Weâ€™re living the future sothe present is our past.
